code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignUp(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/users',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password,email})});const data=await response.json();if(data.success){console.log("REGISTRATION SUCC_ESSFUL: ",data);}else{console.log("FAILED REGISTRATION, Please try again.");}}catch(error){console.error('Error during sign up:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Account Registration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Username"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Username",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Create Password"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Sign Up"})]})]});}export default SignUp;
